name: Mediville Madness
description: In the far medieval lands of Mediville, King Bling of the ice lands fears that the Orcs and Goblins of the gremlin world will attack by sea. Queen Greanne has chosen her finest knights to save her ally as she fears that her kingdom will be next. You shall go through the haunted woods of Lillygayl, the bustling streets of Novitorskyi, or cross the ice bridge of death, where no knight ever returns.  You must make it there or else the Goblins and Orcs destroy the castle.
